title: Walmart | IN3 Android | Bangalore
content:
Years of Experience: 3
Company: Walmart
Title/Level: SDE3 / IN3
Location: Bangalore
Base Salary: 22 LPA
Total comp (Salary + varibale + Stock): 22(base) + 20% variable + 25%(RSU vesting in 3 yrs)
Benefits: Normal walmart benefits.

title: Synopsys
content:
Education: B.Tech from NIT CS
Years of Experience: 3.5+ years
Company: synopsys
Title/Level: staff engineer
Location: Bangalore, India
Base: INR 24lpa(including 1.15lpa as pf)
Signing Bonus: 5LPA
Performance-based Bonus: INR 2.88 lakhs
Rsu -Not given
Relocation - 1 lpa
Total comp (Salary + Bonus + Stock): ~INR 32 lpa
Benefits: Standard
